eg.document.styledtext

Class Attributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.styledtext.Attributes

  • public final class Attributes
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines character attributes, each with a foreground color and a weight. The shade of the blue foreground and the foreground for brackets depend on the background theme.
